messages.title: A two horse race
messages.content: Recent results in our area have shown that the election this time could be too close to call between Chris Coleman and the Conservatives.

messages.title: 3 things to remember
messages.content: Chris Coleman and the Liberal Democrats are working for real change - change that works for you.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can’t win here - only Chris Coleman can beat the Tories.

issues.economy: Labour have let this area down. But the Tories only promise cuts and tax breaks for the rich.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chris Coleman was born and brought up in Gloucestershire. He continues to live here and works locally as a solicitor. He is committed to standing up for our area in Parliament.

quotes.text: By-elections held locally in 2009, the LibDems finished ahead of the Conservatives. Labour finished last each time.
